prompt: <description>Part 1: Rectangular Prism with a Curved Side Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The prism is centered on the x-axis and is slightly tilted on the y-axis. The height of the prism is approximately twice the width. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Now, create the 2D sketch on the XY plane of the new coordinate system. The sketch contains a single face (face_1) with a loop (loop_1) and four lines (line_1, line_2, line_3, and line_4): - Line 1: Start Point = [0.0, 0.0], End Point = [0.2248, 0.0] - Line 2: Start Point = [0.2248, 0.0], End Point = [0.2248, 0.375] - Line 3: Start Point = [0.2248, 0.375], End Point = [0.0, 0.375] - Line 4: Start Point = [0.0, 0.375], End Point = [0.0, 0.0] The loop is a closed loop connecting the four lines in sequence. Now, scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.375. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Finally, extrude the 3D sketch with the following properties: - Extrude Depth Towards Normal: 0.75 - Extrude Depth Opposite Normal: 0.0 - Sketch Scale Factor: 0.375 - Operation: Create a new solid body. The resulting part will be a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The prism is centered on the x-axis and is slightly tilted on the y-axis. The height of the prism is approximately twice the width. Length: 0.375 Width: 0.375 Height: 0.75 Now, continue with instructions for other parts as necessary.</description>

<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.2248,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.2248,0.0],"End Point":[0.2248,0.375]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.2248,0.375],"End Point":[0.0,0.375]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.375],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.75,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.375,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>

The resulting shape is a rectangular metal plate with two holes on the top side. The part's dimensions are: * Length: 0.75 * Width: 0.0375 * Height: 0.75</description>
